posts.message:
Guys,

I have two CSV database files with [email, first name, last name]. I want to remove the content of a CSV file from the other one. 

Story: 10K records CSV email database, was tested for bad email, software only exported 900 records that's bad and should be removed from the original database.

Anyone with experience getting this done, even using excel?

Thanks

Ask wikipedia from command line using Ruby 
https://gist.github.com/9206453

#ruby #rails #ror #wikipedia

السلام عليكم ورحمة الله وبركاته 
كيف يستطيع الشخص إنشاء أو برمجة نظام تشغيل ؟

posts.message:
Guys,

What's the best self hosted script to run email marketing campaigns, we all know MailChimp, CampaignMonitor .etc which gets freaking expensive if you have a lot of subscribers, we used this simple script http://codecanyon.net/item/newsletter-system/52667 but it was very very elementary with few tracking options.

I'm looking for a self-hosted email newsletter system with a bit more advanced options that preferably can work with Wordpress.

This seems like a hot option:
http://codecanyon.net/item/mymail-email-newsletter-plugin-for-wordpress/3078294

What do you think?
